00000111001010000000  LDR 3,0,address(128,1) -> R3=1023
00001010000010000000  STR 2,0,address(128,0) -> address(128)=255
00001111000010000000  LDA 3,0,address(128,0) -> R3=128
10100111010010000000  LDX 3,1,address(128,0) -> Ix1=768
10101010010010000000  STX 2,1,address(128,0) -> address(896)=768
00010011000010000000  AMR 3,0,address(128,1) -> R3=128+256=374
00010111000010000000  SMR 3,0,address(128,1) -> R3=374-256=128
00011011001000001111  AIR 3 15-> R3=128+15=143
00011111001000001111  SIR 3 15-> R3=143-15=128
00101001000001001010  JZ 1,0,address(74,0) -> to 74
00101101000001001011  JNE 1,0,address(75,0) -> to next(75)
00110001000001001100  JCC 1,0,address(76,0) ->to next (76)
00110101000001001101  JMP 0,address(77,0)   ->to 77
00111001000001001110  JSR 0,address(78,0)   ->R3=78 to 78
00011011001000000010  AIR 3 2-> R3=78+2=80
00111101000001001110  RFS 78 -> R0=78 PC=r3=80 
01000000000001010001  SOB 0,0,address(81,0) -> R0=77 PC=81
01000100000001010010  JGE 0,0,address(82,0) -> to 82     
01100110000000000000  NOT
01011101100000000000  AND
01100001100000000000  ORR
01011001100000000000  TRR
01010010010000000000  MLT
01010110010000000000  DVD
01111100000100000001  SRC 0,1,L,A -> r0=154
10000000000100000001  RRC 0,1,L,A -> r0=308
